messages.messageBody:
Hi Sarah,

I'm glad you saw the post. I just wanted to pass on the information and it didn't come out like I thought it would. I sent it from Amazon and it looks like an add - sorry.

----- Original Message -----
From: Sarah Carothers
To: unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, January 23, 2002 2:26 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Patricia S. Caldeira wants you to see this product at Amazon.com


THANK YOU, Pat!!!!
--
Sarah Carothers, puddles@... on 01/23/2002

messages.messageBody:
Med school interests,

I found this product at Amazon.com and thought it might be
interesting to Sarah and others with similar interests.

Pat

------------------------------------------------------------

From High School to Med. School : The definitive guide to accelerated
medical programs

Our price: $18.00*

Availability:

Usually ships in 4 to 5 days*

To view this item, go to:
http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/0738818615/ref=rm_item

*price and availability are subject to change.

------------------------------------------------------------

Pat <Homeschoolmd@...> requested that we send this
message. If you have questions or feedback for Amazon.com
products, please e-mail us at info@....
